thread.title: BRIEF-Cognizant Says High Court In Chennai Granted A Stay Of Indian IT Department's Actions

title: BRIEF-Cognizant Says High Court In Chennai Granted A Stay Of Indian IT Department's Actions
text:
April 3, 2018 / 6:43 PM / in 41 minutes BRIEF-Cognizant Says High Court In Chennai Granted A Stay Of Indian IT Department's Actions Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 3 (Reuters) - Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp : 
* HIGH COURT IN CHENNAI GRANTED CO’S APPLICATION FOR A STAY OF THE ACTIONS OF INDIAN INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT 
* HIGH COURT IN CHENNAI ALSO GRANTED CO’S APPLICATION FOR A LIFTING OF THE ITD’S ATTACHMENT OF CO’S BANK ACCOUNTS 
* AS PART OF STAY ORDER, TO DEPOSIT $75 MILLION TO BE KEPT IN SUSPENSE ACCOUNT BY ITD, WITH REMAINDER MARKED UNDER LIEN 
* COURT FURTHER GRANTED CO’S REQUEST TO ADDRESS ITD’S COLLECTION ACTIONS, SCHEDULED HEARING LATER IN APRIL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
